channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Soundcore lance les Nebula P1 et P1i, deux vidéoprojecteurs pensés pour la mobilité avec des enceintes originales
item.description: La marque soundcore, appartenant à Anker Innovations, dévoile officiellement deux nouveaux vidéoprojecteurs Nebula, les P1 et P1i, conçus pour apporter une image grand format et un son intégré ou déporté, avec Google TV et Netflix au cœur de l’expérience.

item.title: Si vous avez un compte Sumeria (ex-Lydia), la plateforme va vous facturer des « frais d’inactivité »
item.description: Banque en ligne extrêmement populaire en France, du fait de sa filiation avec le service Lydia, Sumeria va commencer à facturer des « frais d’inactivité » pour les comptes qui n’utilisent pas le service.

item.title: 1Password is getting more expensive soon - says change is despite the fact ‘pricing has remained largely unchanged for many years’
item.description: 1Password is raising its prices, but it's still cheaper than it was 14 years ago.

item.title: Behold the Haunting Gaze of C-3PO’s Disembodied Head From ‘The Empire Strikes Back’
item.description: The 'Star Wars' relic is part of a large entertainment memorabilia auction hosted by Propstore in March.

item.title: Uber previews its Dubai air taxi service
item.description: Uber is one step closer to going airborne. On Wednesday, the company previewed its air taxi booking service ahead of an expected launch in Dubai later this year. The inaugural Uber Air program will let travelers book Joby Aviation's electric air taxis through a familiar process in the Uber app.The experience of booking an air taxi will be much like reserving a four-wheeled Uber. In the app, after entering your destination, Uber Air will appear as an option for eligible routes. The Uber app will book a flight and an Uber Black to pick you up and drop you off at a Joby "vertiport."The process of...

item.title: I use this simple repetition trick with ChatGPT when it misses the point — and it works every time
item.description: Repeating prompts to ChatGPT and AI chatbots improves their responses.

item.title: Windows 11 : testez en avant première la grosse mise à jour de mars, elle devrait vous plaire
item.description: La mise à jour de mars pour Windows 11 contient de nombreuses améliorations et correctifs réjouissants pour tous les utilisateurs. Voici les principaux ajouts.

item.title: C’est officiel, Steam n’a plus aucun Steam Deck disponible à la vente en France
item.description: La pénurie des composants de mémoire et de stockage vient de rattraper Valve. Le Steam Deck est désormais en rupture de stock complète en France.

item.title: Capcom confirms console and PC launch times for Resident Evil Requiem — and you can preload the game right now
item.description: Pre-ordered Resident Evil Requiem? Here's when you can expect to play the game on launch day as Capcom reveals release times.

item.title: Nvidia seemingly wants to make Linux better for gamers — and one way or another, that must worry Microsoft
item.description: Job ad hints at Linux GPU driver improvements — which could be an exciting sign for the future of gaming.

item.title: Huge Garmin update alert! Garmin Fitness Coach arrives in-app and on-watch — and one of my favorite features just got a big boost too
item.description: Gym-goers get guided workouts just like runners and cyclists, plus more gear tracking updates

item.title: The Lego Botanicals Flower Bouquet has dropped below $50 at Amazon — save $12
item.description: As of Feb. 25, the Lego Botanicals Flower Bouquet is on sale at Amazon for $47.99, 20% off its list price of $59.99.

item.title: Russia fines Google 22.8 million rubles for promoting VPNs on the Play Store
item.description: Russian regulator Roskomnadzor has fined Google 22.8 million rubles after the tech giant reportedly ignored orders to remove six ads promoting VPNs. As the Kremlin tightens its grip on the internet, these tools have become essential for residents looking to access restricted services like YouTube and Telegram.

item.title: Stephen Colbert gives his verdict on Trumps State of the Union 2026
item.description: Stephen Colbert has responded to Trump's State of the Union address in 2026.

item.title: Walmart is expected to drop heavily discounted Pokémon TCG Journey Together Booster Bundles today — how to buy
item.description: Walmart has dropped the Pokémon TCG Scarlet and Violet Journey Together Booster Bundle for less on Feb. 25.

item.title: 'I want to make sure everybody knows I'm committed to Xbox'
item.description: The new CEO of Xbox has spoken on her vision for the future of the brand in a new interview.

item.title: Discord delays its age verification plans and says 'we're listening' — but it's too little too late
item.description: The backlash on age verification plans has finally forced Discord to act, but it's not at all what users wanted to hear.

item.title: Denver Announces Data Center Moratorium as Opposition Picks Up Steam Around the Country
item.description: Many states are considering a moratorium. Will national politicians catch up?

item.title: Regular Best Buy shoppers shouldn't miss this rare opportunity to grab 50% off these handy shopping perks
item.description: A My Best Buy Plus membership is now 50% off, so here's why regular shoppers at the retailer don't want to miss this rare opportunity to score a saving.

item.title: Amazon divise par deux le prix de la Turtle Beach Stealth Pivot, une manette intrigante avec des touches rotatives
item.description: La Turtle Beach Stealth Pivot attire l'attention avec son design très particulier qui dénote beaucoup par rapport à la manette de Xbox traditionnelle. Toutefois, l'appareil cache de nombreux défauts qui sont atténués avec cette promotion de presque 70 euros sur Amazon.

item.title: YouTube Premium’s cheapest tier just got better — with background play and downloads
item.description: YouTube is adding downloads and background play to the Premium Lite tier, but ad-free music videos are still paywalled.

item.title: The First Reactions to ‘Project Hail Mary’ Are Out of This World
item.description: Ryan Gosling stars in the Andy Weir sci-fi adaptation, in theaters March 20.

item.title: Talk to Your Own Personal Isaac Newton With Ailias’s Hologram Avatars
item.description: If you've ever wanted to bounce ideas off your favorite historical figure, Ailias gives you the chance.

item.title: Boîte de réception | Vieilles autos électriques, IA et données financières et protection avancée d’Apple
item.description: Chaque mercredi, notre journaliste répond à vos questions en lien avec le numérique et les nouvelles technologies. Cette semaine, on active la protection avancée d’Apple, on s’inquiète des données financières transmises à l’IA générative, et on mise sur le vieillissement prolongé des voitures électriques.

item.title: Walmart is dropping exclusive Pokémon TCG collectibles for Pokémon Day 2026 — heres how to buy
item.description: For four days, Walmart is dropping exclusive Pokémon TCG collectibles for Walmart+ members.

item.title: L’armée finlandaise achète pour 15 millions d’euros de drones au français Parrot
item.description: La Finlande muscle sa défense avec les micro-drones français Parrot ANAFI UKR. Un contrat de 15 millions d'euros taillé pour la guerre moderne.

item.title: Get the Pokemon TCG: Mega Evolution Phantasmal Flames Booster Bundle for the best price at Walmart — save vs. Amazon and TCGplayer
item.description: The Pokémon TCG: Phantasmal Flames Booster Bundle is $51.98 at Walmart, beating Amazon and TCGplayer prices.

item.title: Anthropic reveals Remote Control, a mobile version of Claude Code to keep you productive on the move
item.description: Local Claude Code CLI sessions can now be accessed from apps or browsers through Remote Control, and it's different to Claude Code on the web.

item.title: Tesla pourrait enfin corriger l’un des défauts les plus agaçants de ses voitures électriques : les essuie-glaces
item.description: Tesla s'apprêterait à corriger l'une des fonctions les plus frustrantes de ses voitures électriques : les essuie glaces automatiques.

item.title: Score AirPods 4 (without ANC) for under $100 at Amazon
item.description: As of Feb. 25, the AirPods 4 (without ANC) are on sale at Amazon for $99. This is 23% off their list price of $129.

item.title: Le smartphone modulaire n’est pas mort, cette marque croit pouvoir réussir là où Google et LG ont échoué
item.description: Souvenez-vous de Project Ara ou du LG G5. Le smartphone modulaire est le serpent de mer de la tech, une promesse jamais tenue. Tecno tente pourtant de le ramener à la vie au MWC 2026 avec un système magnétique ultra-fin.

item.title: Honor says its 4.8mm thick MagicPad 4 is the world's slimmest Android tablet
item.description: Ahead of a full release at Mobile World Conference (MWC), Honor has teased the MagicPad 4 that it calls the world's thinnest Android tablet. The new model is just 4.8mm thick (not counting that camera bump), a full millimeter thinner than the MagicPad 3 and slightly less than the 5.1mm iPad Pro and Samsung Galaxy Tab S11, the company revealed. On top of being thinner, the MagicPad 4 has a new 12.3-inch 165Hz OLED display. While slightly smaller than before, it should be considerably better than the LCD display on the previous model. The new model weighs 145 grams less than before at 450g thank...

item.title: « Retour à Xbox » : Asha Sharma se confie sur sa vision du jeu vidéo chez Microsoft
item.description: Nouvellement nommée à la tête de Xbox, Asha Sharma a tenu à rassurer les joueurs en indiquant vouloir revenir aux sources de ce qui a fait le succès de la branche.

item.title: « Une grave violation de confiance » : Google aurait menti sur sa politique de sideloading sur Android
item.description: Au cœur d’une polémique concernant le verrouillage de l’écosystème Android, Google est désormais accusé d’avoir menti à la communauté sur sa politique concernant l’installation d’applications hors du Play Store.

item.title: Best Wireless Headphones (2026): I Compare Bose, Apple, Sony and More
item.description: From workout-ready earbuds to gaming over-ears, these WIRED-tested picks sound like a million bucks.

item.title: Kubuntu Focus Zr Gen 1 Review: A Powerhouse Linux Laptop
item.description: Need the power of a Linux desktop in a laptop? Kubuntu Focus’ latest laptop is perfect for developers, video editors, and anyone who needs serious computing power.

item.title: Microsoft says it will give some slow Windows users the 'gift of time' to upgrade - but it'll cost you
item.description: For every two Windows 11 PCs, there's still a Windows 10 PC out there, so Microsoft offers "the gift of time" – paid ESU plans.

item.title: Today only, Best Buy has slashed $300 off the Samsung 85-inch Class Q8F QLED 4K TV
item.description: As of Feb. 25, the Samsung 85-inch Class Q8F QLED 4K TV is on sale at Best Buy for $1,399.99 as part of its Deal of the Day. That's $300 off its list price of $1,699.99.

item.title: Avec cette remise de 400 euros, il est temps de se ruer sur le JMGO N1S Pro, un vidéoprojecteur qui diffuse des images ultra lumineuses en 4K
item.description: Avec sa technologie triple laser et sa très belle luminosité de 2 250 lumens, le JMGO N1S Pro est un super vidéoprojecteur qui tombe à 1 099 euros chez Amazon, soit une remise de 400 euros sur son prix d'origine.

item.title: How solopreneurs will use AI to rival mid-sized companies
item.description: Assembling a digital workforce will allow smaller companies to compete with much larger ones. Through the end of the 2010s, people were a company’s infrastructure. Large workforces provided the scaffold upon which a business could build capacity for complexity: hire more people, take on more work.

item.title: The Pokémon TCG Ascended Heroes Elite Trainer Box is at its best-ever price on Amazon — save vs. TCGplayer and Walmart
item.description: Pokémon TCG: Ascended Heroes Elite Trainer Box is $119.99 at Amazon — its lowest price for readily available these ETBs so far.
